title: Mixing Politics & Entertainment | Daily Best of October 31 | Rick & Bubba
description:
Country star Luke Bryan comes under fire for having the audacity to bring Gov. Ron DeSantis onstage during a concert that raised awareness and a ton of cash for hurricane victims in Florida. Joe Biden votes with his granddaughter and makes us all incredibly uncomfortable. Paul Pelosi is attacked in his home, but the facts of the story are about as clear as mud. NASCAR driver Ross Chastain pulled off an unbelievable maneuver that's only been seen in video games. And Jerry Lee Lewis passes away at the age of 13 — correction, that was the age of his first wife.
Sponsor: Moink delivers grass-fed and grass-finished beef and lamb, pastured pork and chicken, and wild-caught Alaskan salmon, direct to your door - helping Family Farms become financially independent outside of big agriculture. Their animals are raised outdoors, their fish swim wild in the ocean, and Moink meat is free of antibiotics, hormones, sugar, and all the other junk you find pre-packaged in the meat aisle.
